ISSUE.TITLE: "Attached" Media Field No Longer Able to Upload File
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: I am trying to determine what changed and will add an update here when available. As of right now though (code updated a couple of days ago) a Media Field set up as "Attached" will throw an error of ``` {Field Name}: There was an error handling the files. ```

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: SelectAll checkbox should react to selected items (#5683)
